name: EggMan and his GlitchFull Adventure!
description:
You are EggMan, the main character of his new arcade game, but unfortunately the motherboard glitched out and now you find yourself lost in other arcade games, beating all of them in hopes you can find your own!

Think of it as the movie "Wreck it Ralph!", you go from game to game until you find your own, each arcade with its own gameplay and challenge.

Made for the Secret Santa 2020 Jam.
As requested I tried to put a shooting minigame on it, but got so carried away with the idea that I ended up making most of them have shooting mechanics :)

Merry Secret Santa and Holidays to you all!

Controls:
WASD - walk;
Mouse - aim;
Left mouse button - Shoot;
SpaceBar - Jump (if on correct level)
R - Restart;
Esc - Exit.
